about.title: Who are we?
about.subtitle: A foundation that connects governments, academia, and businesses to make innovation a driver of peace
about.description: We are a non-profit organization dedicated to bringing education in science, technology, and innovation to vulnerable communities. We work with a territorial approach that respects and enhances Colombia's cultural diversity.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To democratize access to STEM education through contextualized programs that strengthen local capacities and generate sustainable development opportunities in vulnerable territories.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be recognized as leaders in transformative education that connects innovation, territory, and peace, positively impacting over 100,000 people by 2030.

hero.title: We transform lives through education and technology
hero.description: We are a non-profit foundation that connects governments, academia, and businesses to make innovation a driver of peace, prosperity, and planet conservation.

peace.title: Peace and dignity
peace.description: Technology as a bridge to protect life and cultural diversity.

science.description: We work with data, evidence, and collaborative experimentation.

innovation.title: Sustainable innovation
innovation.description: Every project cares for the territory and reduces the climate gap.
